rules_text:
[i](As this enters, insert it into one of your three programs. At your first main phase each turn, the next program runs all its Subroutines.)[/i]
Whenever this Subroutine runs, you draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
flavor_text:
[i] I was watching. You did well. <
 I held on as long as I could. <[/i]
